name: TeleGunner
description:
TeleGunner is a 3D puzzle/ platformer where you teleport and slow time to solve the goal is to solve the worlds in as few shots as possible to unlock more levels. This game is currently in early access and will be updated with 10 more levels & new features every Saturday. The game currently also has a level generator that will allow you to practice trick shots and get a good feel for the game, so you can do the more difficult missions more easily!

NOTE: The video is showing a randomly generated level, in order to not show any of the actual levels.
